name: Frank
specialties: Strategic digital business leader with extensive experience driving revenue growth, operational efficiency, and digital transformation across multinational tech, financial, and consumer sectors. Expertise includes marketing innovation, AI-driven automation, and scaling online platforms. Proven leadership of cross functional teams (up to 24 FTEs) and successful track record of delivering double-digit growth in complex, international environments.
Leadership & Growth: Executive Stakeholder Management | Strategic & Operational Business Development | P&L and Budget Management
Marketing & Digital Innovation: Cross-Channel Marketing (Online/Offline) | Brand & PR Management | CRM & Customer Service
Technology & Transformation: Digital Process Automation (AI, Python, SQL, n8n) | Program Management & International Rollouts
